channel.title: CVE Feed for 1Panel-dev -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 1Panel-dev -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-30257|2024-04-18T14:56:56.270Z -- 1panel-dev -- 1panel
item.description: 1Panel is an open source Linux server operation and maintenance management panel. The password verification in the source code uses the != symbol instead hmac.Equal. This may lead to a timing attack vulnerability. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.10.3-lts.
